title: Leaverbuster
body: I feel like leaverbuster should take account the situation the player is in. Like ive played games where the enemy is leaps and bounds ahead of me in terms of skill. Of course im going to leave a game where i have done nothing but get slaughtered.

replies.body: if the game is going so poorly, just use it to practice mechanics or throw up a surrender. If it's really that bad, I'm sure your teammates will probably want to get out of that game too and just play something more fun.

first, leavebusters is a bot, it will ban you no matter what your situation is.
second, suck it up, some games we carry and some we get DESTROYED its life, just stand in fountain and change windows to youtube.
